translation.sidebar-gists-create-text: Enter a filename for your new gist.
translation.warning-erase-text: Are you sure you want to do this? All unsaved code will be erased!
translation.engine-no-instances: Please open an instance to view settings.
translation.settings-reset-desc: Pressing this button will reset all settings and close the application.
translation.settings-reset-confirm: Are you sure you want to erase all settings?
translation.settings-reset-feedback: Settings have been reset. The application will now close.
translation.settings-experimentalsettings-desc: Enable or disable access to experimental, potentially unstable settings.
translation.settings-debugmode-desc: Enable or disable debug mode features. Requires a restart.
translation.settings-editorstyle-desc: Adjust the vertical position of the editor action bar and tabs.
translation.settings-sidebarlayout-desc: Adjust the horizontal location of the sidebar (file list).
translation.settings-actionbar-direction-desc: Adjust the vertical location of the actionbar.
translation.settings-ligatures-desc: Enables whether font ligatures will be rendered.
translation.settings-compactbtns-desc: Reduces the size of the editor buttons.
translation.settings-squaretabs-desc: Use compact square tabs instead of round padded ones.
translation.settings-lualsp-desc: Enables the intelligent autocompletion and intellisense engine. Requires restart to apply.
translation.settings-tablength-desc: Changes the amount of tabs inserted for indentation.
translation.settings-fsize-desc: Changes the size of the editor font.
translation.settings-tablimit-desc: Limits the amount of tabs available in the editor. 0 = unlimited.
translation.settings-newtabcontent-desc: What will be written to the contents of a new tab.
translation.settings-smoothscroll-desc: Enables smooth scrolling in the editor.
translation.settings-animcursor-desc: Enables smooth movement of the cursor.
translation.settings-unsavedwarn-desc: Warnings will be shown when trying to delete unsaved content.
translation.settings-scale-desc: Sets the zoom level of the UI.
translation.settings-navbarstyle-desc: Adjust the layout and positioning of the navigation bar.
translation.settings-windowtransparency-desc: Use a different rendering mode for theme transparency effects. Applies on reboot.
translation.settings-topmost-desc: Forces the interface to render on top of all windows.
translation.settings-silentlaunch-desc: Drastically reduces the presence of the interface
translation.settings-tray-desc: Enables the tray icon and hides the window when minimizing.
translation.settings-verticalnavcenter-desc: Moves the vertical navbar items to the top instead of the center.
translation.settings-classiclayout-desc: Emulates the classic editor layout from yesteryear.
translation.settings-logconsole-desc: Save all console outputs to console.log
translation.settings-autoconsole-desc: Whether the console will show up under the editor at launch.
translation.settings-lspconsole: Log language server errors to output
translation.settings-lspconsole-desc: Mostly for UI developers that are toying with the LSP.
translation.settings-preservelogs-desc: If enabled, console logs will be preserved and loaded every launch. Could take space very rapidly.
translation.settings-preservationcount-desc: Maximum amount of console messages to be preserved. Default: 720
translation.settings-enableconnections-desc: When disabled, new instances will not connect to the UI.
translation.settings-dmsync-desc: Automatically adds instance contents into intellisense.
translation.settings-dmmode-desc: Some modes may be more performant than others. Only touch this if you know what you are doing.
translation.settings-view-changelog-desc: Clicking this will show you the changelog for the latest version.
translation.settings-filelist-desc: You can set extra directories to show up in the sidebar.
translation.settings-hidefiles-desc: Toggle the visiblity of the sidebar. CTRL+B can also be used.
translation.settings-sounds-desc: When enabled, certain interface elements and notifications will have subtle sounds.
translation.settings-manualupdate-desc: Click this button to trigger a manual update.
translation.settings-informationarea-desc: Whether the information area below the editor should be shown.
translation.settings-tokenizationlines: Maximum characters to tokenize per line
translation.settings-tokenizationlines-desc: Controls the number of characters that is styled per editor line.
translation.settings-scrollspeed-desc: Adjusts the speed at which the mouse scrolls in the editor.
translation.settings-contextualexecution-desc: Files ran from the UI will assume the workspace of their directory.
translation.settings-ai-desc: Enable beta AI features for code editing.
translation.settings-enable_autoexec-desc: Runs scripts within 'autoexec' folder upon instance creation and teleport.
translation.settings-explorer_show_nil_instances-des: Show nil instances in the explorer tree
translation.settings-open_pseudocode_external: Open decompiled code in external UI
translation.settings-open_pseudocode_external-desc: Sends decompiler pseudocode to the external UI instead of displaying it internally
translation.settings-error_only_syn_threads: Only show errors from Synapse threads
translation.settings-error_only_syn_threads-desc: By default, only show errors that come from Synapse threads, instead of all errors with a Synapse function in the call stack.
translation.settings-hide_from_obs-desc: Hide the internal UI from OBS
translation.settings-decomp_use_cache-desc: Batch Decompiler: Check cache before decompiling
translation.settings-ui_hotkey-desc: The key(s) used to toggle the internal UI
translation.settings-notify_on_error-desc: Sends notification whenever a Synapse script errors
translation.settings-notify_on_dangerous_action-desc: Sends a notification when a dangerous function call or property access is detected
translation.settings-decomp_auto_cache-desc: Batch Decompiler: Automatically cache decompiled scripts
translation.settings-explorer_show_class_names-desc: Renders class names instead of names in the explorer tree
translation.settings-64bit_mode-desc: Compile scripts to x64 native code. Certain functions may be disabled. Premium only.
translation.settings-cloud_decompilation-desc: Decompile scripts faster with our cloud decompilation server. Premium only.
translation.settings-editor-opt1: Actions on bottom, tabs on top
translation.settings-editor-opt2: Actions on top, tabs on bottom
translation.settings-gistpat-dialog-request: Github Gist integration requires a Github personal access token. Would you like to create one? (will open a browser window)
translation.settings-gistpat-dialog-input: Enter your personal access token below.
translation.theme-directory-desc: You can place all custom themes in this folder.
translation.theme-reset-desc: This will reset all layout-related settings to their defaults.
translation.theme-error-p1: An error has occured while applying theme.
translation.theme-error-p2: Do you want to reset theme settings?
translation.ai-key-contents: Input your SynapseAI key below. You can get yourself key over at the OpenAI website.
translation.ai-key-link: An OpenAI key is necessary to use SynapseAI.
translation.ai-error-generic: SynapseAI has errored. Make sure your key is correct, or has not expired.
translation.lite-grandfathered: Thank you for being a Synapse X veteran. As you have bought Synapse X before Version 3.0 was released, you were upgraded to full Synapse X for free.
translation.lite-notice: You are currently using Synapse X Lite. While you have full execution ability, some extra functionality is only accessible for full Synapse X users.
translation.lite-upgradenow: Are these benefits interesting? If so, consider purchasing the full version of Synapse X over at {{buylink}}.
translation.lite-userupgrade: Thank you for upgrading to the full version of Synapse X. Your premium benefits have been unlocked.
translation.lite-featurelock: This feature is only available to full Synapse X users. Consider purchasing the full version of Synapse X over at {{buylink}}.
translation.lite-featuretable-1-desc: The full power of our execution is available to all users.
translation.lite-featuretable-2-desc: Our detailed documentation is entirely free-of-charge.
translation.lite-featuretable-3-desc: We welcome all of our users to our Discord community.
translation.lite-featuretable-4-desc: Upgrade to the full version of Synapse X to enjoy JIT compilation of scripts.
translation.lite-featuretable-5-desc: Premium users have access to our hosted cloud decompilation platform for blazingly fast decompilations.
translation.lite-featuretable-6-desc: If you upgrade, you can test the next versions of Synapse X before everybody else!
translation.lite-featuretable-7-desc: Both Lite and premium users can use Synapse X on their Xbox consoles.
translation.lite-featuretable-8-desc: Both Lite and premium users can use our version of Synapse X for Linux platforms.
translation.lite-featuretable-9-desc: Premium users get unrestricted access to our macOS, iOS and Android ports.
translation.trial-offer: You can try the full version of Synapse X today for 15 days. Do you want to activate your free trial?
translation.trial-activated: Your free trial of the full version of Synapse X has been activated.
translation.trial-activated-platforms: Your trial entitles you download Synapse X/Synapse C for other platforms. Visit {{dllink}/downloads for more information.
translation.trial-daysleft: You have {{daysleft}} days left on your trial. If you find our software satisfactory, please consider purchasing Synapse X.
translation.trial-expired: Your Synapse X trial has expired. You will be reverted to Synapse X Lite. Please consider purchasing Synapse X.
translation.trial-buyat: You can buy the full version of Synapse X over at {{buylink}}.
translation.platform-trial: Your use of Synapse on {{platform}} is on trial mode. You will have to upgrade to the full version of Synapse X after {{daysleft}} days.
translation.platform-outdated: {{platform}} is too outdated. Please update your operating system before using Synapse X.
translation.platform-no-update: Update data for {{platform}} isn't available yet. Please try again later.
translation.platform-win32-notice: We do not support 32-bit Windows operating systems. Please upgrade your setup to a 64-bit OS before using Synapse X.
translation.platform-macOS-notice: You are currently using Synapse X on macOS. Please note that macOS support is currently in beta, and certain features may be unstable. For more information, please visit https://x.synapse.to/dev/helpdesk/macOS
translation.platform-linux-notice: You are currently using Synapse X on a Linux system. Please note that Linux support is currently in beta, and certain features may be unstable. For more information, please visit https://x.synapse.to/dev/helpdesk/wine
translation.platform-xbone-notice: You are currently using Synapse X on Xbox One. Please note that Xbox support is currently in beta and some portions of the UI may be inaccessible without a mouse and a keyboard. Press the Menu and View buttons together to open the Synapse X interface during gameplay. For more information, please visit https://x.synapse.to/dev/helpdesk/xbox
translation.platform-ios-notice: You are currently using Synapse C on iOS. Please note that the iOS interface is minimal due to our underlying library (Capacitor) being limited in flexibility. Use remote features for greater functionality. For more information, please visit https://x.synapse.to/dev/helpdesk/mobile-ios
translation.platform-android-notice: You are currently using Synapse C on Android. Please note that the Android interface is minimal due to our underlying library (Capacitor) being limited in flexibility. Use remote features for greater functionality. For more information, please visit https://x.synapse.to/dev/helpdesk/mobile-android
translation.powertool-langserver-dialog-contents: You can only have one language server installed at a time. Do you want to uninstall the current one?
